tool_description: NBA (National Basketball Association) feature-rich current and historical NBA API. Team and player statistics powered by [basketball-reference](https://www.basketball-reference.com/).
name: Basketball Head
title: Basketball Head

api_list.name: Totals
api_list.description: Get player career totals for both the playoffs and regular season.

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The relevant season, for example: Career, 2023-2024, 2022-2023

api_list.name: Advanced
api_list.description: Get advanced stats for both the regular season and playoffs

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The relevant season, for example: Career, 2023-2024, 2022-2023

api_list.name: Per 36 minutes
api_list.description: Get per 36 minute stats for both the playoffs and regular season

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The relevant season, for example: Career, 2023-2024, 2022-2023

api_list.name: Team Schedule and Game Results
api_list.description:
Get the teams schedule and game results for a given season

ATLANTA_HAWKS = 'ATL'
    BOSTON_CELTICS = 'BOS'
    BROOKLYN_NETS = 'BRK'
    CHARLOTTE_HORNETS = 'CHO'
    CHICAGO_BULLS = 'CHI'
    CLEVELAND_CAVALIERS = 'CLE'
    DALLAS_MAVERICKS = 'DAL'
    DENVER_NUGGETS = 'DEN'
    DETROIT_PISTONS = 'DET'
    GOLDEN_STATE_WARRIORS = 'GSW'
    HOUSTON_ROCKETS = 'HOU'
    INDIANA_PACERS = 'IND'
    LA_CLIPPERS = 'LAC'
    LOS_ANGELES_LAKERS = 'LAL'
    MEMPHIS_GRIZZLIES = 'MEM'
    MIAMI_HEAT = 'MIA'
    MILWAUKEE_BUCKS = 'MIL'
    MINNESOTA_TIMBERWOLVES = 'MIN'
    NEW_ORLEANS_PELICANS = 'NOP'
    NEW_YORK_KNICKS = 'NYK'
    OKLAHOMA_CITY_THUNDER = 'OKC'
    ORLANDO_MAGIC = 'ORL'
    PHILADELPHIA_76ERS = 'PHI'
    PHOENIX_SUNS = 'PHO'
    PORTLAND_TRAIL_BLAZERS = 'POR'
    SACRAMENTO_KINGS = 'SAC'
    SAN_ANTONIO_SPURS = 'SAS'
    TORONTO_RAPTORS = 'TOR'
    UTAH_JAZZ = 'UTA'
    WASHINGTON_WIZARDS = 'WAS'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com/teams/LAL/schedule/2023-2024"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com/teams/{teamid}/schedule/{seasonid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Salaries
api_list.description: List all salary information for all seasons a given player has played.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com/players/curryst01/stats/Salary"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-head.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Per 100 possessions
api_list.description: Get per 100 stats for both the regular season and playoffs

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The relevant season, for example: Career, 2023-2024, 2022-2023

api_list.name: Per game
api_list.description: Get player per games stats for both the playoffs and regular season

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The relevant season, for example: Career, 2023-2024, 2022-2023

api_list.name: Player metadata
api_list.description: Get a player from the database by the internal player id
